job.title: Data Scientist, Machine Learning

solve impactful problems our team strongly believes that being helpful accelerates results and we support one another to be successful at cartaltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtthe problems youll solve the dynamics of private markets and ownership ltligtltligt develop machine learning models to power new financial products and to extract trends from performance of existing products ltligtltligt automate monitoring of data distributions to detect and flag anomalies ltligtltligt partner with product managers engineers and business teams to incorporate datadriven insights into decisionmaking helping cartas current and future data scientistsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout youltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtcandidates must have a strong foundation in statistics be proficient in sql and python and datastores redshift or similar ltligtltligt a deep understanding of modern statistical and machine learning models when to apply them and how to evaluate their performance ltligtltligt strong
